Christ's righteousness a believer's surest plea for eternal life, or, The doctrine of justification by the imputation of the righteousness of Christ stated, cleared, and vindicated in several sermons on Rom. 3. 22 / by Michael Harrison, minister of Casfield in Bucks. Harrison, Michael, Minister at Potters-Pury.
[12], 55 p.
Printed for Nathanael Ranew, London : 1691.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library. Includes bibliographical references.
